name: Instacart-Costco
description: 'Instacart-Costco'. A recreation of Instacart's website. Enhanced layout regarding the findability of specific items via navigation, personalization, flow and accessibility.

name: World Tour
description: 'World Tour' allows users to take a satellite journey to both familiar and foreign lands of Earth. You can randomly teleport or get specific in your search for regional data.

name: Cues
description: 'Cues' allows you to get quick data regarding film, television, and theater production activity in New York City. Discover when NYC properties are utilized by the dramatic arts industry.
